title: Administrator's appointment and duties
context: [ยง386A-10] Administrator&rsquo;s appointment and duties. The board shall appoint and may remove the fund&rsquo;s administrator and fix the administrator&rsquo;s salary. The administrator shall manage and conduct the fund&rsquo;s business affairs under the board&rsquo;s direction and policies. The administrator shall perform other duties prescribed by the board. [L 1985, c 296, pt of ยง11]
